sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CONCAT(CASE WHEN Error_Count = 0 THEN 'SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' ELSE 'FAILED LOAD : ' END,Work_Sheet, ' - ', Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Error_Table, Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error'
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Answers_DWH_Export' THEN 'audit.OPS_Answers_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Contracts' THEN 'audit.OPS_Contract_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Harvest Reconcilliation' THEN 'audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Major Severe Incidents' THEN 'audit.OPS_Incident_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Operations' THEN 'audit.OPS_Operation_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Other Sales' THEN 'audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Related Party Transactions' THEN 'audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Risk Opportunity Register' THEN 'audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error'
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Strategic Projects' THEN 'audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error'
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Table,
CASE WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Certifications' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
     WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Timber Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Answers_DWH_Export' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Answers_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Contracts' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Harvest Reconcilliation' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Major Severe Incidents' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Operations' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Other Sales' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Related Party Transactions' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Risk Opportunity Register' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
	 WHEN Work_Sheet = 'Strategic Projects' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}')
ELSE NULL END AS Error_Count
FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT Work_Book, Work_Sheet, wb.Asset_ID, wb.Fund_ID,
ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM [audit].[OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List] wb
JOIN [relational].[Asset] ra 
ON wb.Asset_Id = ra.Asset_ID AND wb.Fund_Id = ra.Fund_ID  AND ra.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND wb.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') x
)z;
